channel.title: Have premier members?<----------------read on
channel.description:
Basically I saw this on a non-runescape forum and thought it would be a great idea.
[glow=red,2,300]Totally optional![/glow] Basically mopar has to [glow=red,2,300]PAY[/glow] for this domain,right?Maybe we could set up a member group called [glow=red,2,300]premier members[/glow] which make a payment one time (small amount)for the site?This would give them certain priveledges and have the premier member label under their names?This label could be forever or for a week or two?Maybe a rep top up also...If those people were getting banned maybe they could appeal and be reconsidered on the grounds that they contributed to this community?
This would allow people to show how really grateful they are to mopar and repay him somehow.He has to take care of this whole forum (as the head)with other staff you know.
This is just a simple suggestion and would really appreciate it if you could consider it,guys.

item.title: Have premier members?<----------------read on
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

People look up to people generally if they have a high rep+ count,so a premier members title wouldn’t do anything,Its like a sitting duck.But it all depends on how you put it,Somepeople may think its buying title while others may think its a reward…

Read full topic

keep clicking…

Thanks for the suggestions, but this will never happen as long as I am administrator here ;)[/quote]

item.title: Have premier members?<----------------read on
item.dc:creator: @the_one1 the one
item.description:
@the_one1 wrote:

Look,I’m not saying you buy rep.
The purpose of this is so that we can have funding for stuff,I don’t know,buying auths for cheats?
You said

yes but you shouldnt care about rep unless your a leecher all [b]it is is an indication of work you have done and its a gift[/b] you shouldnt always expect to get rep its only if people think you went out of your way to help others and not wanting anything in return
Isn't contributing to moparisthebest.com a acceptable reason for a little rep++ and a little title? People may think that I may be trying to launch a paying service for rank but I'm not.I'm just suggesting a money bank for suitable use,and using rep and the member title as a possible reward,I'm not saying rep and a member titleis [b]the only[/b] way to reward these people,they could be rewarded in another way.

For example,they could get a post count up,that would not affect much as a post count only gives you a member,junior member or a senior member rank,and that does not affect anything,no extra privledges for senior members,right?

Read full topic

avistetto:

buying rep would be gay because it shows how much experience someone has and how helpful someone is, so its an indication but if you could buy it there would be no point in it because some rich leecher would try being “L33T” and others helping people wouldnt be high repped

Well most of the time leechers dont give rep even if you do help out…
